topic_metadata.title: How to remove spacing between content

posts.name: mgholam
posts.cooked: I have a table followed by a grid, and I would like to have no spacing between them (currently there is ~0.5cm white space)
posts.raw: I have a `table` followed by a `grid`, and I would like to have no spacing between them (currently there is ~0.5cm white space)

posts.name: mgholam
posts.cooked:
Found it :

#table(...)
#v(-13pt) // moves grid up	   
#grid(...)

posts.name: Laurenz MÃ¤dje
posts.cooked: If you do not want to hard-code the value, you can use #v(0pt, weak: true) instead. With weak: true, it will consume the existing spacing.
posts.raw: If you do not want to hard-code the value, you can use `#v(0pt, weak: true)` instead. With `weak: true`, it will consume the existing spacing.

posts.name: mgholam
posts.cooked:
Thanks!
Although it did not work with page header and a table after, I have to use a hard coded value #v(-34pt) in my case.
posts.raw:
Thanks!
Although it did not work with page header and a table after, I have to use a hard coded value `#v(-34pt)` in my case.
